meanings.definition: The act or process of adopting a child.
meanings.sent1: Many families experience joy through adoptions.
meanings.sent2: International adoptions can be a lengthy process.
meanings.sent3: The adoptions of puppies at the shelter brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: Her adoptions of new hobbies enriched her life.
meanings.sent5: The adoptions of ideas can lead to great innovations.

meanings.definition: The act or process of choosing or taking on something as one's own.
meanings.sent1: His adoptions of healthy habits improved his well-being.
meanings.sent2: Corporate adoptions of new technologies can boost efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The adoptions of quirky fashion trends by teenagers always make me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her adoptions of different perspectives broadened her understanding.
meanings.sent5: The adoptions of new traditions can bring families closer together.

meanings.definition: The legal act of taking another's child as one's own.
meanings.sent1: International adoptions require careful legal procedures.
meanings.sent2: The adoptions of orphaned children changed their lives forever.
meanings.sent3: The adoptions of fictional characters in her stories added an interesting twist.
meanings.sent4: His adoptions of responsibility for his siblings showed his maturity.
meanings.sent5: The adoptions of new policies in the company were met with mixed reactions.
